title: Wearable Biomimetic Appendage (WBA)
description: The Wearable Biomimetic Appendage is a soft robotic device that can mimic a user's hand and finger movements to aid in basic tasks. The device is composed of three main components: a control glove, a calibration and controller program, and a wearable robotic hand.

title: Computer Aided Analysis Library
description: Independent Numerical Methods Library using Python, and the Numpy and MatPlotLib Libraries done on my own as an extension on the material and concepts taught in ELEC 2110 - Computer Aided Analysis
